titles: The present state of the Jews (more particularly relating to those in Barbary) wherein is contained an exact account of their customs, secular and religious : to which is annexed a summary discourse of the Misna, Talmud, and Gemara / by L. Addison ...
author: Addison, Lancelot, 1632-1703.
publisher: Printed by J.C. for William Crooke ... and to be sold by John Courtney ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
